document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Subpoena Contact 
Date: Wed, 31 Jul 2019 21:56:29 +0000 
Attachments: Epstein_Subpoena_Index.xlsx 
Hi 
Attached is an index listing the subpoenas we have sent out and an indication of whether we have received a  response. I 
only marked an entry as non-responsive if we received nothing from the entity. For instance, if we received a  letter stating 
a lack of records, that was still marked as yes. So for any entry labeled "No", we received nothing. If you have any records 
we are missing please send them over, and if we have any outstanding subpoenas the AUSAs are hoping you can check in 
with the entities. 
Let me know if you have any questions, or if I can be of any help. 
Thanks, 
Andy 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, July 25, 2019 6:51 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Subpoena Contact

From 
Sent: Wednesday, July 24, 2019 4:34 PM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Subpoena Contact 
) 
[Contractor]" 
< 
> wrote: 
I  will be in the office around 9 tomorrow morning. Let me know what time is good for you. 
EFTA00021741

On Jul 24, 2019 1:15 PM,' wrote: 
HI 
Thanks again for helping with this project. By way of introduction, I've copied Andy Hamilton, a paralegal in our 
unit. If you could please connect with Andy to discuss this project, that would be great. I've spoken with him about 
what we're hoping to accomplish, so he can bring you up to speed, but if either of you have questions, please let us 
know. 
Thanks—
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
Mr 
Original Message-----
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, July 24, 2019 1:01 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Subpoena Contact 
I.
Hey 
I just wanted to let you know that our Intel Analyst Natalie Beck will be the point of contact for the subpoena info to 
coordinate with your paralegal. She is cc'd on this email. 
Special Agent 
FBI New York 
VCACIHuman Trafficking 
EFTA00021742
